name: L-lysine:NAD+ 6-oxidoreductase (deaminating)
definition: L-Lysine + NAD+ + H2O <=> L-2-Aminoadipate 6-semialdehyde + NADH + Ammonia + H+
comment: first step of two-step reaction (see R10054, R00446+R02317)

pathways.rn00960: Tropane, piperidine and pyridine alkaloid biosynthesis
